courses.title: JavaScript Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript including variables, functions, loops, and DOM manipulation.

courses.title: React.js for Beginners
courses.description: Master the basics of React including components, props, state, and hooks to build interactive UIs.

courses.title: Node.js & Express Backend
courses.description: Build scalable backend applications using Node.js, Express, REST APIs, and middleware.

courses.title: MongoDB Essentials
courses.description: Understand NoSQL database concepts, CRUD operations, and schema design using MongoDB.

courses.title: Frontend with HTML & CSS
courses.description: Learn to structure and style modern websites using semantic HTML and advanced CSS techniques.

courses.title: Fullstack MERN Bootcamp
courses.description: A complete bootcamp to build fullstack applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.
